timeline.message:
Hide Delta Lake tables

Hive connector cannot read from Delta Lake tables and some users prefer
not to see such tables at all.

timeline.bodyText: MetastoreConfig is the wrong class to use. Today, it configures which metastore type to use. This information would not be useful to metastore implementations. The new config you want should be in a different config class. (perhaps MetastoreConfig should be renamed to MetastoreTypeConfig so you can use the MetastoreConfig name)
